results.title: Metformin for early comorbid glucose dysregulation and schizophrenia spectrum disorders: a pilot double-blind randomized clinical trial
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ for early comorbid @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@glucose dysregulation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Schizophrenia_Spectrum_and_Other_Psychotic_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019967 @@@schizophrenia spectrum disorders@@@: a pilot double-blind randomized clinical trial

results.title: Study protocol of a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multi-center trial to treat antipsychotic-induced weight gain: the Metformin-Lifestyle in antipsychotic users (MELIA) trial
